item.title: [PI] Death cape invisible! please help![PI]
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

I have recently added death cape to my PI client side and you can see it as a item but when you wear it its invisible
here is some info

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot


Here are ints:

if(i == 15510) {
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 3288;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 500;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1;
itemDef.anInt204 = 14;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 32879;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 32879;
itemDef.anInt175 = -1;
itemDef.anInt197 = -1;
itemDef.anInt199 = -1;
itemDef.name = “Death cape”;
itemDef.description = “Death cape.”.getBytes();
}

please help immediatly
